00031    VanHove::VanHove(System& system) 
00032     : SystemDiagnostic<System>(system),
00033       isInitialized_(false)
00034    {}

00036    VanHove::~VanHove()

00040    void VanHove::readParam(std::istream& in) 
00041    {
00042 
00043       // Read interval and parameters for AutoCorrArray
00044       readInterval(in);
00045       readOutputFileName(in);
00046 
00047       nAtomType_ = system().simulation().nAtomType();
00048       atomTypeCoeffs_.allocate(nAtomType_);
00049       readDArray<double>(in, "atomTypeCoeffs", atomTypeCoeffs_, nAtomType_);
00050 
00051       read<int>(in, "nBuffer", nBuffer_);
00052       read<int>(in, "nWave", nWave_);
00053       waveIntVectors_.allocate(nWave_);
00054       waveVectors_.allocate(nWave_);
00055       fourierModes_.allocate(nWave_);
00056       accumulators_.allocate(nWave_);
00057       for (int i = 0; i < nWave_; ++i) {
00058          accumulators_[i].setParam(nBuffer_);
00059       }
00060 
00061       readDArray<IntVector>(in, "waveIntVectors", waveIntVectors_, nWave_);
00062       isInitialized_ = true;
00063    }
00064 
00065    /*
00066    * Clear accumulators.
00067    */
00068    void VanHove::setup() 
00069    {
00070       if (!isInitialized_) {
00071          UTIL_THROW("Error: Object not initialized");
00072       }
00073       assert (nBuffer_ > 0);
00074       assert (nWave_ > 0);
00075       for (int i = 0; i < nWave_; ++i) {
00076          accumulators_[i].clear();
00077       }
00078    }
00079  
00081    void VanHove::sample(long iStep) 
00082    {
00083       if (isAtInterval(iStep))  {
00084 
00085          Vector  position;
00086          std::complex<double>  expFactor;
00087          double  product, coeff;
00088          System::ConstMoleculeIterator  molIter;
00089          Molecule::ConstAtomIterator  atomIter;
00090          int  nSpecies, iSpecies, i;
00091 
00092          makeWaveVectors();
00093 
00094          // Set all Fourier modes to zero
00095          for (i = 0; i < nWave_; ++i) {
00096             fourierModes_[i] = std::complex<double>(0.0, 0.0);
00097          }
00098  
00099          // Loop over all atoms to calculate Fourier modes
00100          nSpecies = system().simulation().nSpecies();
00101          for (iSpecies = 0; iSpecies < nSpecies; ++iSpecies) {
00102             system().begin(iSpecies, molIter); 
00103             for ( ; molIter.notEnd(); ++molIter) {
00104                molIter->begin(atomIter); 
00105                for ( ; atomIter.notEnd(); ++atomIter) {
00106                   position = atomIter->position();
00107                   coeff    = atomTypeCoeffs_[atomIter->typeId()];
00108  
00109         // Loop over wavevectors
00110                   for (i = 0; i < nWave_; ++i) {
00111                
00112                      product = position.dot(waveVectors_[i]);
00113                      expFactor = exp( product*Constants::Im );
00114                      fourierModes_[i] += (coeff*expFactor);
00115        
00116                   }
00117   
00118                }
00119             }
00120 
00121          }
00122 
00123          // Add Fourier modes to autocorrelation accumulators
00124          double sqrtV = sqrt(system().boundary().volume());
00125          for (i = 0; i < nWave_; ++i) {
00126             accumulators_[i].sample(fourierModes_[i]/sqrtV);
00127          }
00128 
00129       }
00130 
00131    }
00132 
00136    void VanHove::makeWaveVectors() 
00137    {
00138       Vector    dWave;
00139       Boundary* boundaryPtr = &system().boundary();
00140       int       i, j;
00141 
00142       // Calculate wavevectors
00143       for (i = 0; i < nWave_; ++i) {
00144          waveVectors_[i] = Vector::Zero;
00145          for (j = 0; j < Dimension; ++j) {
00146             dWave  = boundaryPtr->reciprocalBasisVector(j);
00147             dWave *= waveIntVectors_[i][j];
00148             waveVectors_[i] += dWave;
00149          }
00150       }
00151    }
00152 
00153    void VanHove::output() 
00154    {
00155       std::string suffix;
00156       int i, j;
00157 
00158       // Echo parameters to a log file
00159       fileMaster().openOutputFile(outputFileName(".prm"), outputFile_);
00160       writeParam(outputFile_);
00161       outputFile_.close();
00162 
00163       // Output autocorrelation functions to file
00164       fileMaster().openOutputFile(outputFileName(".dat"), outputFile_);
00165       for (i = 0; i < nWave_; ++i) {
00166 
00167          #if 0
00168          // Construct file suffix for this structure factor
00169          suffix = std::string("_");
00170          for (j = 0; j < Dimension; ++j) {
00171             suffix += toString(waveIntVectors_[i][j]);
00172          }
00173          suffix += std::string(".dat");
00174          outputFile_ << suffix << std::endl;
00175          //fileMaster().openOutputFile(outputFileName(suffix), outputFile_);
00176          #endif
00177 
00178          for (j = 0; j < Dimension; ++j) {
00179             outputFile_ << Int(waveIntVectors_[i][j], 5);
00180          }
00181          outputFile_ << Dbl(waveVectors_[i].abs(), 20, 8);
00182          outputFile_ << std::endl;
00183          accumulators_[i].output(outputFile_);
00184          outputFile_ << std::endl;
00185          outputFile_ << std::endl;
00186          //outputFile_.close();
00187 
00188       }
00189       outputFile_.close();
00190 
00191    }
